title: 6️⃣ "Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose." - Lyndon B. Johnson
content: (kind of a funky one for a fun day): Write a program that prints the amount of characters its source has in English words. So a program that is 44 characters long would output “forty four” and a program that is 108 characters long would output “one hundred eight”.
